SEARCH
Package bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model

Class FlightBookingSystem

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.FlightBookingSystem
public class FlightBookingSystem extends Object
The FlightBookingSystem class represents a system for managing flights, customers, and bookings. It includes methods for adding, retrieving, and deleting flights, customers, and bookings.

    • addFlight

      public void addFlight(Flight flight) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Adds a flight to the system.
      Parameters:
      flight - The flight to be added.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - If there is a duplicate flight ID or a flight with the same number and departure date already exists in the system.

    • addCustomer

      public void addCustomer(Customer customer) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Adds a customer to the system.
      Parameters:
      customer - The customer to be added.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - If there is a duplicate customer ID.

    • addBooking

      public void addBooking(Booking booking) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Adds a booking to the system.
      Parameters:
      booking - The booking to be added.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - If the customer or flight associated with the booking is not found, or if there is a duplicate booking ID.

      Parameters:
      flightId - The ID of the flight to be deleted.

      Parameters:

    • updateBookingFlight

      public void updateBookingFlight(int bookingId, int newFlightId) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Updates the flight for a booking.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The ID of the booking to update.
      newFlightId - The ID of the new flight.
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - If the booking or new flight is not found, or if the booking is cancelled.
